Bosses.Name: Lyssa
Bosses.Strategy: When the boss hides during the snowstorm look towards which crater the footprints lead. That's where the boss will reapper. Stand behind it to avoid the upcoming half room AoE.

KeyMechanics.Name: Frigid Stomp
KeyMechanics.Description: Unavoidable raidwide damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Skull Dasher
KeyMechanics.Description: Tankbuster.

KeyMechanics.Name: Frostbite and Seek
KeyMechanics.Description: Boss casts a snowstorm and becomes invisible. Safe zone is behind the boss. Look where the footprints in the snow end to see at which crater the boss will spawn.

KeyMechanics.Name: Icicall
KeyMechanics.Description: Icicles spawn around the arena casting a circle AoE around them, followed by line AoEs either alon the edges or through the middle of the arena.

KeyMechanics.Name: Heavy Smash
KeyMechanics.Description: Party stack.

Bosses.Name: Ladon Lord
Bosses.Strategy: The three heads of the boss indicate which third of the arena will get hit by his breath mechanics. His left head breathes at the left third behind the boss, his right head at the right third behind him, and his middle head at the third in front of him.

KeyMechanics.Name: Scratch
KeyMechanics.Description: Tankbuster.

KeyMechanics.Name: Intimidation
KeyMechanics.Description: Unavoidable raidwide damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Pyric Blast
KeyMechanics.Description: Parts stack.

KeyMechanics.Name: Inhale
KeyMechanics.Description: Boss inhales Aether, preparing for one or two of his heads to use Pyric Breath.

KeyMechanics.Name: Pyric Breath
KeyMechanics.Description: Boss leaps to the middle and his swollen heads will fire wide cone shaped AoEs.

KeyMechanics.Name: Pyric Spheres
KeyMechanics.Description: Four Pyric Spheres spawn that will cast cross shaped AoEs across the arena.

Bosses.Name: Hermes
Bosses.Strategy:
The boss may augment his next mechanic with Double or his next two mechanics with Quadruple. 
The main mechanic 'Hermetica' consists of large, green rectangles spawned at the edge of the arena. The order in which they appear indicates the order they fire. When the boss spawns these rectangles after meteors stand behind the uncracked meteors to break line of sight with the Hermetica AoEs to avoid damage.
Also interrupt the boss when he casts True Bravery, so he doesn't get a buff.

KeyMechanics.Name: Trismegistos
KeyMechanics.Description: Unavoidable raidwide damage.

KeyMechanics.Name: Double
KeyMechanics.Description: Augments the next spell.

KeyMechanics.Name: Quadruple
KeyMechanics.Description: Augments the next two spell.

KeyMechanics.Name: True Tornado
KeyMechanics.Description: Tankbuster. Also casts a circle AoE below the target if empowered by Double or Quadruple.

KeyMechanics.Name: True Bravery
KeyMechanics.Description: Boss receives a damage up buff. Cast can be interrupted.

KeyMechanics.Name: True Aero
KeyMechanics.Description: Targeted line AoEs at every player. Also casts an avoidable line AoE at the position of each player if empowered by Double or Quadruple.

KeyMechanics.Name: True Aero II
KeyMechanics.Description: Targeted line AoEs at every player. Also casts an avoidable line AoE at the position of each player if empowered by Double or Quadruple.

KeyMechanics.Name: Meteor
KeyMechanics.Description: 4 proximity AoEs at the edges of the arena that leave a meteor behind that can block line of sight attacks.

KeyMechanics.Name: Hermetica
KeyMechanics.Description:
Large green panels at the edge of the arena fire line AoEs that knock players back.
Three sets of panels: 
Simply stand in the middle to avoid.
Two panels on two sides: 
Don't stand in the middle to avoid.
Empowered by Double: 
Needs line of sight towards the panels to be broken with the Meteors. Cracked meteors break after one hit, uncracked meteors can take both hits.
Empowered by Quadruple:
Two panels spawn on each side in circular order. Move around the arena to avoid the line AoEs.
